 Perennials are plants that live for more than two years and typically bloom annually. They are often found in moist, shady areas and prefer well-drained soil. Examples of perennials include lilies, hostas, astilbes, and ferns.

 The StarCraft franchise consists of three games: StarCraft , StarCraft: Brood War , and StarCraft II: Wings of Liberty . It also includes several expansion packs and a spin-off game, StarCraft: Ghost . The games are set in the science fiction universe of the Koprulu Sector and follow the story of the Protoss, Terran, and Zerg races. The games feature real-time strategy gameplay and have been praised for their depth and complexity.

 Sure . The viola is a stringed musical instrument , usually with a deep , rich sound . It is slightly larger than a violin and has a lower , deeper sound . It is usually played with a bow and is part of the violin family . It is usually used in orchestras and chamber music ensembles .

 Yes, acrylic paint is different from oil paint. Acrylic paint is a water-based paint that is fast-drying and can be used on a variety of surfaces. Oil paint is a fat-based paint that takes a long time to dry and is typically used on canvas. Acrylic paint is easier to use and clean up, while oil paint provides more vibrant colors and a more textured finish.

 Improvisational dancers use their body language and facial expressions to convey emotion and tell stories without the use of set choreography. They often use their entire body to create a story with their movements and use their environment to enhance the performance. They also use their eyes to connect with the audience and create a unique and interactive experience.

 Agriculture is the science and art of cultivating plants and animals for food, fiber, and other products used to sustain life. It includes the cultivation of crops, raising livestock, forestry, and horticulture. Some basic facts about agriculture are that it is the world's oldest profession, it is the most widespread economic activity, and it is the mainstay of the global economy. Agriculture is also responsible for providing food, jobs, and opportunities for economic growth and development.

 Hospitals began as places of refuge and safety for the sick and injured. In the past, people would bring their sick relatives to a place of worship and leave offerings for them, hoping for a miraculous cure. Over time, these places evolved into hospitals, where the sick could receive proper medical care and attention.
